definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: bosom of a garment (Ar. h.id.nun, Eth.h.d.n: also Syr. h.ano0 bosom (= h.9n0 *), v. Hoffm:ZMG 1878, 753 Lag:M ii. 361 ff.; BN 46 f.; on this word and foll. v. Ba:NB 120; ZMG 1889, 183)—[[שֶׁלּאׁ מִלֵּא כַפּוֹ]] [[קוֹחֵר וְחִחְנוֹ מְעַמֵּר]] Ps 129:7 (grass) with which a reaper filleth not his hand, nor a binder his bosom.
